reviews.review_msg: She's an amazing prof. Helps all students as much as she can and is super caring. One of my favorite profs in SFU.
She has an attitude problem and is impatient with her students. She talks too fast, and is terribly disorganized,  MALORGANISÃ©! Unless if you are a french pro, don't bother with her.
Overall, one of the best in the French department. Very lively classes, material was communicated clearly, grading was mostly fair. I really enjoyed Madame Blancard!
High expectations but lots of help available. Very receptive to comments, really tries to help each person understand as opposed to just blathering on. Watch grammar and anglicismes.

I've had her for three consecutive semesters now in 221, 222 and 300 and she is great! She is very kind and approachable and really enjoys making the class laugh. When it comes to marking there's not that much you can do as a French prof (either you got it wrong or you didn't). She is great!
